name: Comparison Table
description: Side-by-side feature or plan comparison with multiple display formats. Ideal for pricing tiers, product comparisons, or feature matrices.

requiredProps.name: columns
requiredProps.description: Array of column definitions with name and optional highlighted flag

requiredProps.name: rows
requiredProps.description: Array of feature rows with per-column boolean or string values

optionalProps.name: variant
optionalProps.description: Visual variant: table, side-by-side, or checkmark-matrix

variants.name: Table
variants.description: HTML table with sticky first column and highlighted column accent

variants.name: Side by Side
variants.description: Card columns listing features with check/x marks

variants.name: Checkmark Matrix
variants.description: Feature grid with checkmarks, columns as options, rows as features
